resources.string: A Campus Safety student employee will be available to give safe rides from specifically marked locations from November 1–April 1 6 p.m.–1 a.m., April 1–October 31 7 p.m.–1 a.m. every night.

Mankato Land to Air Express offers shuttle service from the St. Peter Food Co-op in St. Peter to and from the Minneapolis/St. Paul International Airport. Gustavus students may pre-arrange pick up and drop off at 3 Flags on campus. For a reservation, contact Land to Air Express (507) 625-3977 or toll free at (888)-736-9190. This guarantees your seat on the shuttle. Gustavus students may purchase reduced priced tickets at the Information Desk for travel out of or into St. Peter.

Gus Bus will transport anyone that wants to travel anywhere in the Saint Peter area for free. 
 Phone Number: (888) 880-4696 
 Hours of Operation: 
 Wednesday: 10pm - 2am 
 Friday and Saturday: 9pm - 2am 
 Outside these specified times, students can use the St. Peter Transit to travel at prices listed on the website.
